subject: Hello need help with an order from aliexpress.
description_text:
Hello,

I just ordered your plus X pedals from aliexpress but i was told that they
are not in stock in germany anymore. Then i saw on aliexpress that u have
the pedals and the heelplate as a separate product in stock in germany.

Can u pls confirm that both these 2 products are in stock in germany
warehouse?

Thank u

https://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005009148139391.html?spm=a2g0o.cart.0.0.1a1738daSnE0z5&mp=1&pdp_npi=5%40dis%21RON%21RON%202224.32%21RON%201045.43%21%21RON%20991.09%21%21%21%40211b807017558802499116191e3225%2112000048961339905%21ct%21RO%216034009982%21%211%210

https://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005009148139391.html?spm=a2g0o.cart.0.0.1a1738daSnE0z5&mp=1&pdp_npi=5%40dis%21RON%21RON%20736.11%21RON%20345.98%21%21RON%20328.00%21%21%21%40211b807017558802499116191e3225%2112000048961339901%21ct%21RO%216034009982%21%211%210
